name: part_004
file: tmp_【 ＃百鬼あやめ生誕祭2023 】Nakiriayame 6th BirthDay  ～Shoot the heart～ [FOai83VIogA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Baby I Hate You' (ベイビー・アイヘイチュー).
MC section by Nakiri Ayame, discussing previous songs, her outfit, and showing off her megaphone.
Transition animation sequence featuring silhouettes of various Hololive members.

subtitles.original: ベイビー・アイヘイチューが
subtitles.english: Baby, baby, I hate you...

subtitles.original: とまらない！
subtitles.english: It doesn't stop!

subtitles.original: これからさぁ
subtitles.english: From now on,

subtitles.original: あなたと何回やんの
subtitles.english: How many times will we play

subtitles.original: 会話のドッジボール
subtitles.english: Conversational dodgeball?

subtitles.original: ベイビーベイビー・アイニーチューな
subtitles.english: Baby, baby, I need you,

subtitles.original: レベルでアイヘイチュー
subtitles.english: at a level of "I hate you."

subtitles.original: ウラのウラのオモテのハート
subtitles.english: A heart on the surface's backside,

subtitles.original: わかってほしんだよ
subtitles.english: I want you to understand!

subtitles.original: Hey! Hey!
subtitles.english: Hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: もっと見てくれなきゃ
subtitles.english: If you don't look at me more...

subtitles.original: アイヘイチュー！
subtitles.english: I hate you!

subtitles.original: アイヘイチュー！
subtitles.english: I hate you!

subtitles.original: Hey! Hey! Hey!
subtitles.english: Hey! Hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: 気にしてくれなきゃ
subtitles.english: If you don't care about me...

subtitles.original: アイヘイチュー！
subtitles.english: I hate you!

subtitles.original: アイヘイチュー！
subtitles.english: I hate you!

subtitles.original: 今日こそあなたに伝えなきゃ
subtitles.english: Today I must tell you.

subtitles.original: やっぱたまに素直が1番だもん
subtitles.english: After all, being honest once in a while is best.

subtitles.original: 今まで冷たくしてたわけじゃないよ？
subtitles.english: It's not like I was being cold to you until now, right?

subtitles.original: 勘違いやめてね
subtitles.english: Don't misunderstand.

subtitles.original: STOP!! STOP!!
subtitles.english: STOP!! STOP!!

subtitles.original: 誤解解きたいの気づいて！
subtitles.english: Notice that I want to clear things up!

subtitles.original: じゃないと知らないところに行っちゃうよ？
subtitles.english: Otherwise, I'll go somewhere you don't know.

subtitles.original: あのね　あたし　実はあなたのことが…
subtitles.english: Um, you know, actually I...

subtitles.original: なんて言えたらそれはもう大成功！！
subtitles.english: If I could say that, it would be a huge success!!

subtitles.original: …とはいかない毎晩反省会
subtitles.english: ...But it's not that easy; every night's a reflection.

subtitles.original: ベイビーベイビー・アイヘイチューが
subtitles.english: Baby, baby, I hate you...

subtitles.original: おわらない！
subtitles.english: It doesn't end!

subtitles.original: これでまたあなたと何回やった？
subtitles.english: How many times did I do this with you again?

subtitles.original: 「バイバイ」のチキンレース
subtitles.english: A "bye-bye" chicken race.

subtitles.original: ヘイトミーヘイトミーなほど離れられない
subtitles.english: The more you hate me, the more I can't leave.

subtitles.original: キライのウラにくっつくハート
subtitles.english: A heart sticking to the back of "I hate you."

subtitles.original: わかってほしい
subtitles.english: I want you to understand.

subtitles.original: Oh!
subtitles.english: Oh!

subtitles.original: ベイビーベイビー・アイヘイチューが
subtitles.english: Baby, baby, I hate you...

subtitles.original: とまらない！
subtitles.english: It doesn't stop!

subtitles.original: このままさぁあなたと何回だって
subtitles.english: Just like this, as many times as it takes,

subtitles.original: ヘイトとアイのシーソーゲーム
subtitles.english: a seesaw game of hate and love.

subtitles.original: ベイビーベイビー・アイラブユーくらい
subtitles.english: At a level of "I love you," baby,

subtitles.original: 言わせろよ！アイヘイチュー！
subtitles.english: let me say it! I hate you!

subtitles.original: ウラのウラじゃ伝わらないの
subtitles.english: It won't reach you from the very back.

subtitles.original: わかっているから
subtitles.english: Because I know that.

subtitles.original: それでもヘイト向けちゃうアイに
subtitles.english: Still, for the love that points hate,

subtitles.original: 気づいてほしいの
subtitles.english: I want you to notice.

subtitles.original: Hey! Hey!
subtitles.english: Hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: もっと見てくれなきゃ
subtitles.english: If you don't look at me more...

subtitles.original: アイヘイチュー！
subtitles.english: I hate you!

subtitles.original: アイヘイチュー！
subtitles.english: I hate you!

subtitles.original: Hey! Hey!
subtitles.english: Hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: 気にしてくれなきゃ
subtitles.english: If you don't care about me...

subtitles.original: アイヘイチュー！
subtitles.english: I hate you!

subtitles.original: アイヘイチュー！
subtitles.english: I hate you!

subtitles.original: Hey! Hey!
subtitles.english: Hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: もっと見てくれなきゃ
subtitles.english: If you don't look at me more...

subtitles.original: アイヘイチュー！
subtitles.english: I hate you!

subtitles.original: アイヘイチュー！
subtitles.english: I hate you!

subtitles.original: Hey! Hey!
subtitles.english: Hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: 気にしてくれなきゃ
subtitles.english: If you don't care about me...

subtitles.original: アイヘイチュー！
subtitles.english: I hate you!

subtitles.original: アイヘイチュー！
subtitles.english: I hate you!

subtitles.original: アイヘイチュー、アイヘイチュー
subtitles.english: I hate you, I hate you.

subtitles.original: 明日からアイヘイチューッッ
subtitles.english: From tomorrow, I hate you-u-u!

subtitles.original: MC忘れてましたーーー！
subtitles.english: I forgot the MC section---!

subtitles.original: ということで皆さん、どうだったでしょうか？ゲスト1曲目は「妄想アスファルトアメ」でした！
subtitles.english: So everyone, how was it? The first guest song was "Mousou Asphalt-Ame"!

subtitles.original: やぁ、どうだった？どうでしたか？え、ちなみにあくあと初めて二人で歌ったんですよ、3Dライブで。
subtitles.english: Wow, how was it? How was it for you? By the way, it's the first time Aqua and I sang together in a 3D live.

subtitles.original: あくあ、ありがとう！いや、「妄想アスファルトアメ」ね、めっちゃいい。あくあの歌っている板が可愛くて、余も一緒に歌いたいなと思って今回一緒に歌わせていただきました。
subtitles.english: Aqua, thank you! No, "Mousou Asphalt-Ame" is really good. The way Aqua sings is so cute, and I wanted to sing it too, so I asked to sing with her this time.

subtitles.original: そしてソロの「スキスキ絶頂症」、ちょっと余なんか...余っぽくないかなと思ってちょっと不安だったんですけど、ど、どうですか？どうですか？
subtitles.english: And for my solo "Suki Suki Zecchoushou," I was a bit... I was worried it might not be very "me," but h-how was it? How was it?

subtitles.original: あ、可愛い？あ、ありがとう、ありがとう。
subtitles.english: Ah, cute? Ah, thank you, thank you.

subtitles.original: そしてそして、三人、「ベイビー・アイヘイチュー」でねねちとあくあで歌いました！やったーー！可愛かったでしょ？
subtitles.english: And and, the three of us sang "Baby I Hate You" with Nene-chi and Aqua! Yay! It was cute, right?

subtitles.original: そして、みんなお気づきになられました？あの、余のこの右手に持ってる、左手ですね、持ってるこのメガホン！
subtitles.english: And did everyone notice? Um, this megaphone I'm holding in my right hand—my left hand, I mean!

subtitles.original: めっちゃ可愛いでしょ？見て！今回のね、ライブのロゴが入っております！見えるかな？
subtitles.english: Isn't it super cute? Look! It has the logo for this live on it! Can you see it?

subtitles.original: そして、あ！これ！これ気づきました？ぽよよのチャームがついてるんです！やったーー！これ超可愛いでしょ？
subtitles.english: And, ah! This! Did you notice this? It has a Poyoyo charm on it! Yay! This is super cute, right?

subtitles.original: なんかあの、「ベイビー・アイヘイチュー」のMVの中にメガホンと旗が出てくるんですけど、それをね、今回余のステージ仕様に作っていただきました！
subtitles.english: You see, a megaphone and a flag appear in the "Baby I Hate You" MV, so I had them made to my stage specifications this time!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！中ね、旗はね、あの...「余等」確か「かわよ」って書いてある大きい旗だったんですけど、
subtitles.english: Thank you! Inside, the flag was... it was a big flag that said "Yo-ra" and "Kawayo," I believe.

subtitles.original: あれは余の手書きで書いております！見てくれたかな？もしね、見逃しちゃった人間様、アーカイブでぜひ見てください！
subtitles.english: I wrote those by hand! Did you see them? If any humans missed it, please check the archive!

subtitles.original: そしてですね、みんな気づいた？Tシャツもこれロゴ同じなんですよ、メガホンと。これ可愛いでしょ？
subtitles.english: And then, did everyone notice? The logo on this T-shirt is the same as the one on the megaphone. Cute, right?

subtitles.original: ほらロゴね、めっちゃ可愛く作っていただきました。ありがとうございます。Tシャツ、ちょっとお腹出てるんですけど、ちょっと見ないでください。
subtitles.english: Look at the logo, it was made so cute. Thank you. My stomach is showing a bit in this T-shirt, so please don't look.

subtitles.original: そして見て！ちょっとカメラさんちょっと...気づきました皆さん？余、いつもブライト衣装スカートなんですよ。これ気づいたみんな？
subtitles.english: And look! Camera person, could you... did everyone notice? I usually wear a skirt for my Bright outfit. Did everyone notice this?

subtitles.original: 余、今日ね、パンツスタイルなんです！見て！可愛いですカ？どうですか？ちょっとね、いつもスカート系なんでちょっと新鮮かなと思うんですけど。
subtitles.english: Today, I'm wearing pants! Look! Is it cute? How is it? Since I usually wear skirts, I thought this might be a fresh look.

subtitles.original: まぁちょっとこの後の曲中でもちょっとパンツスタイルが出てくるんじゃないかなーって思いますよ。そしてそして、ゲストもたくさん来ますので、
subtitles.english: Well, I think this pants style might show up in some of the songs after this too. And and, lots of guests are coming as well,

subtitles.original: お見逃しなく！見てね！
subtitles.english: so don't miss it! Watch, okay!
